item.title: David add a quote by H.L. Mencken
item.description: "I know of no American who starts from a higher level of aspiration than the journalist. . . . He plans to be both an artist and a moralist -- a master of lovely words and merchant of sound ideas. He ends, commonly, as the most depressing jackass of his community -- that is, if his career goes on to what is called a success." -- H.L. Mencken

item.title: David add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description:
"He has all the virtues I dislike and none of the vices I admire."
<a href="http://www.winston-churchill-leadership.com/churchill-quote-others.html">[On British Labour politician Stafford Cripps.]</a>" -- Winston S. Churchill
